sentences.en: A birdcage hung in the sunny window of her house when she was a girl.
sentences.cn: 少女时代,她家那浴满阳光的窗户上挂着一只鸟笼.

sentences.en: County attorney: Well, that's interesting, I'm sure. ( Seeing the birdcage . ) Has the bird flown?
sentences.cn: 县法官: 噢, 真 有意思, 我敢肯定. ( 到鸟笼 ) 飞走了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do person son fault and birdcage gain in the actual life, have similarity?
sentences.cn: 现实生活中, 追名逐利的人儿不是和鸟笼有着相似之处 吗 ?

sentences.en: He keeps a parrot in a birdcage in his living room.
sentences.cn: 他在客厅的鸟笼里养了一只鹦鹉.

sentences.en: He threw the birdcage away with anger.
Ling Feng covered the birdcage with a piece of black cloth.
sentences.cn: 凌锋用一块黑布将鸟盖上了.

words.tran_cn: 鸟笼；鸟笼状物；信号灯；宿舍

trans.tran_cn: 鸟笼，鸟笼状的东西，类似鸟笼的场所（如牢房等）
trans.tran_en: A birdcage is a cage in which birds are kept
